title: Crawl
description:
Developer: Powerhoof

Description:

Crawl is the local multiplayer dungeon crawler where your friends control the monsters! ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bullet-hell beat-em-up meets old-school RPG, in an arcadey party-game for up to 4 players. One player is the hero, exploring a randomly generated dungeon full of traps and monsters - all controlled by the other players. If you slay the hero you take their place and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s your turn to crawl! Then it's a race to gain enough XP and loot to reach the final battle, where it's all on one as the other players collectively control the hulking final boss!

Features:

    Local multiplayer arcade action for 2-4 players

    Turbo charged dungeon crawling - Each half-hour game starts as pitiful weaklings struggle against rats and slugs. By the end you're taking down powerful magic wielding heroes with giant beasts and undead warriors.

    Every game is unique - Equip your hero with loads of weapons, and spells and artifacts as you explore randomly generated dungeons.

    Dozens of unique monsters to unlock and master.

    Play with controllers, keyboard or mouse.

    Hone your skills against bots while your wait for your friends to arrive!

    Original 8-bit meets orchestral soundtrack by Alex Yoder.

    Developed in Unity.

    Released on Early Access 6th August 2014 for PC, Mac and Linux.
